text: Innu avanu akege (muraneya) ‘talak’ kottu bittare, taruvaya ake berobba patiyannu vivahavaguva (hagu ataninda bidugade padeyuva) tanakavu ake atana (modala patiya) palige sam'matalaguvudilla. A balika ata (eradane pati) akeyannu vicchedisidare – tavu allahanu vidhisiruva mitigalannu palisaballevendu avaribbaru bhavisuvudadare – avaribbaru (ake mattu modalane pati) matte paraspara kudikolluvudaralli dosavilla. Ivu allahanu vidhisiruva miti meregalu. Tiluvalike ullavarigagi avanu ivugalannu vivarisuttiddane
